name: Space Pilot R
description:
Play a byte sized Gameboy inspired space 2D rail shooter game by IshiGray. Fly in the space, Take out your enemy ships and  Get a highscore before beating the boss. 

This was a self imposed Game jam I made to see if i can make a game by myself. I think i did a okay job. tho game creation is quite long to do. Still learning and I created this in the Godot game engine. Its just one level game with a simple gameplay loop and has a boss to defeat.

Feedback for later game projects is greatly appreciated!

Controls:

  • Arrow keys: Move
  • Z: Shoot
  • X: Shoot Bombs
  • C: Use Bomb to Heal shields
  • Enter: Pause Game 
  • [-] key : Volume Down
  • [+]key: Volume Up
  • Zero key: Mutes Game sound
